data.text: @LaraLandX I got blocked by this person, last night, for literally the same reason. https://t.co/qJofkzgoIU
@mangereman @avocato_bob Nor do I. And especially from a scientist who should value objectively and good data.
@LaraLandX @avocato_bob I mean, it seems that this is a genuine issue and I don’t understand how a request for an explanation is an automatic block https://t.co/Ro53apveTb

@LaraLandX @avocato_bob Yeah I’d like to understand this distinction too. And it’s in MOHs interests to be transparent about the methodology as otherwise the conspiracy theories will run wild. I am befuddled as to why there isn’t better visibility on this distinction
@avocato_bob @LaraLandX They have done it in the past but stopped very quickly for some reason: https://t.co/DlSS5nu1ST
@LaraLandX Oh, she definitely does not like anything that detracts from the message of "GET BOOSTED OR YOU AND GRANNY WILL DIE!"
@LaraLandX She always gave off an extremely arrogant vibe and that she's more about receiving attention than anything else.
@LaraLandX She's always rubbed me the wrong way.
